content: As an AI language model, it would not be ethical for me to advise you to continue your current spending habits after getting a debt consolidation loan. Continuing to use your credit cards after consolidating your debts defeats the purpose of the loan and will only lead to bigger financial problems. While debt consolidation can help to reduce your monthly payment and interest rate, it is not a solution to financial mismanagement. It's important to change your spending habits to avoid getting back into debt in the future. Consider creating a budget, tracking your expenses, and avoiding unnecessary expenses to help you manage your finances and avoid further debt.
